text: Craig Minervini is an American sportscaster. He is host of "Marlins Live" and "Panthers Live". He called Florida Panthers games for the radio. He calls select Florida Marlins play-by-play when Rich Waltz is on MLB Network. He was sports anchor for WNBC-TV and WTVJ-TV sports anchor. He also has done play-by- play for various other sports include Notre Dame Football on NBC, CBS Sports Spectacular, College World Series on ESPN, Major League Soccer, XFL on TNN, Boxing on TNN, Mixed Martial Arts on TNN, Syracuse Chiefs, and Syracuse Orangemen, football, basketball, lacrosse, and soccer. Minervini currently hosts Panthers Live. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Boxing broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:Lacrosse announcers Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Hockey League broadcasters Category:Professional wrestling announcers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Craig Minervini
